an indie gem    you can feel all the passion from the developers in the game there is so much to discover in drova characters quests monsters magic ruins ancient documents game is not easy though you will need to master weapons and combat be prepared to die often in the beginningbut after all youre just a nobody trying to get important in this world understanding whats happening and what happened is rewarding because your choices really matter  play it
